explicit , symbolic , text planning stag.from sentence: Proposal we propose an explicit , symbolic , text planning stage , whose output is fed into a neural generation system .

unambiguously.from sentence: The text planner determines the information structure and expresses it unambiguously - in our case as a sequence of ordered trees .

neural generation system.from sentence: Once the plan is determined , 2 a neural generation system is used to transform it into fluent , natural language text .
